 \par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi720\li29\qj\b WHEREAS\b0 , the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (\ldblquote HPD\rdblquote ) submitted to the Council its request dated June 4, 2024 that the Council amend a previously approved tax exemption for real property located at Block 309, Lot 1; Block 441, Lot 5; Block 668, Lot 15; Block 765, Lots 6 and 56; Block 781, Lots 74 and 75; Block 885, Lots 46 and 48; Block 959, Lot 7; Block 1168, Lots 30 and 32), Brooklyn (\ldblquote Exemption Area\rdblquote ) pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law;\par

\b WHEREAS\b0 , the HPD\rquote s request for amendments is related to a previously approved Council Resolution adopted on May 16, 2024 (Resolution No. 423) (the \ldblquote Prior Resolution\rdblquote ), granting the Exemption Area a real property tax exemption pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law;\par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi9\li29\qj  \par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi720\li29\qj\b WHEREAS\b0 , the Council has considered the financial implications relating to the Tax Exemption;\par

\par
\b0 The Council approves the amendments to the Prior Resolution requested by HPD for the Exemption Area pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law as follows:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi9\li29\sa37\sl216\slmult1\qj\tab Paragraph d of paragraph 1 of the Prior Resolution is deleted and replaced with the following:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\sa37\sl216\slmult1\qj d. \tab\ldblquote Expiration Date\rdblquote  shall mean the earlier to occur of (i) a date which is forty (40) years from the Effective Date, (ii) the date of the expiration or termination of the Regulatory Agreement, or (iii) the date upon which the Exemption Area ceases to be owned by either a housing development fund company or an entity wholly controlled by a housing development fund company.\par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi720\li29\qj\par
